p: Yeast growth media (YPD): Synthetic defined minimal dropout medium lacking uracil (SDA Medium-URA: MP Biomedicals, Seven Hills, NSW, Australia). Media contains 0.2% yeast nitrogen base, 0.5% ammonium sulfate, 2% glucose and 1.7% agar. The media was sterilized by autoclaving at 121�C for 15 min, then allowed to cool. Following the addition of 0.01% NP-40 (Sigma, St. Louis, MO, USA), 40 mL of agar media was poured into each plate. Plates were stored at 4�C until required.
